text: Approval for the artisan (model 206 and 204) phakic intraocular lens, also known as the verisyse (vrsm5us and vrsm6us) phakic intraocular lens to be distributed by advance medical optics.  The device is indicated for: 1) the reduction or elimination of myopia in adults with myopia ranging from -5 to -20 diopters with less than or equal to 2.5 diopters of astigmatism at the spectacle plane and whose eyes have an anterior chamber depth greater than or equal to 3.2 millimeters; and, 2) patients with documented stability of refraction for the prior 6 months, as demonstrated by spherical equivalent change of less than or equal to 0.50 diopters.
